channel.title: General Motorcycle Madass Sachs Moped on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Motorcycle Madass Sachs Moped on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: My new fascination: Sachs Madass
item.description: I don’t know if it has something to do with the motorcycle gas that runs in my blood (a lot of my relatives are “bikers”) or if it is my dream of looking and being like madmax. Whatever it is - I really like how the Sachs Madass looks. Today at lunch we were walking down Broadway and saw one locked up. It looks insane. It seems to be the melding of a custom scooter, a moped and a homemade motorcycle.
